item.title: Telangana HC junks plea to halt construction of toilets in Jogulamba Gadwal district
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Telangana High Court dismissed a petition filed by Nutan Kumar Reddy seeking to halt the construction of toilets at Zilla Parishad High School in Undavelly village. Reddy claimed the toilets' location near houses and borewells violated fundamental rights.
HYDERABAD: The Telangana high court on Thursday rejected a petition to halt construction of toilets and relocate them in another spot in Zilla Parishad High School in Undavelly village in Jogulamba Gadwal district.The petitioner, Nutan...]]>
item.author: Tnn
